label: Task-1
title: Implement S3 storage bucket provisioning for Memory-FS
description: Create app__deploy__aws__s3 component class with full lifecycle: create(), exists(), verify(), lock_down(), delete(), verify_deleted(). Bucket config: SSE-S3 encryption, block public access, lifecycle rules for TTL. Bucket name pattern: sgraph-send-{env}-storage. Attach IAM policy to Lambda execution role for s3:GetObject, PutObject, DeleteObject, ListBucket scoped to the bucket.

properties.acceptance_criteria: S3 bucket created with correct config. Lambda can read/write via Memory-FS Storage_FS__S3. Full lifecycle round-trip works: create -> verify -> delete -> verify_deleted.
